name: Twisty mazes
description:
A short series of logic mazes that explore the must-turn-left-or-right rule.

  • Number of puzzles: 3
  • Average play time: 20 mins 
  • First published: June 2021 (exclusive to itch.io)
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart. 
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

Hackable version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=b0b1ae00baf4f5aaf58f5664c4573fea

For more information and examples of these types of mazes visit: http://www.clickmazes.com/rules/new-rules.htm#mrules
